name: Corpse Thief
description: A medium humanoid creature with keen agility and stealth, capable of gathering intelligence from objects and the dead.
memorable: The Corpse Thief can see through the eyes of a living owner after studying an object.
goals: To gather information from the living and dead, and to stealthily pilfer small items.
relations: May be associated with undead creatures or other thieves.
environment: Urban areas or graveyards, often where secrets and information are hidden.
strengths: Excellent stealth capabilities and the ability to glean information from objects.
weaknesses: Low Charisma makes it poor in social situations.
attacks: Multiattack with two claw strikes dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Object Reading allows the Corpse Thief to see through the eyes of the living or gain insights from the dead.
senses: It has darkvision allowing it to see in the dark up to 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in stealth with a +5 bonus.
additional_information: Ability to steal small items unnoticed
Can learn about the last owner of an object
Has a strong Dexterity score enhancing agility
Can gain memories from dead owners of objects
Balance of offensive and defensive capabilities
test_queries: creature that reads objects for secrets
urban thief who knows about the dead
